short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track product prices across different websites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Price Tracker - Your Smart Shopping Assistant

Track product prices across any website and never miss a deal again! This powerful price tracking extension helps you save money by monitoring prices automatically.

Key Features:
• Track unlimited products from any online store
• Get instant notifications when prices drop
• View detailed price history with trends
• Set custom target prices for automatic alerts
• Clean, modern interface for easy management
• Works with any online retailer
• Automatic price checks every 2 hours
• Search and filter your tracked products

Perfect for:
✓ Deal hunters
✓ Smart shoppers
✓ Price comparison
✓ Holiday shopping
✓ Wishlist management
✓ Budget planning

Simply add a product URL and your target price, and let Price Tracker do the rest. Get notified when prices drop to your desired level, and make informed buying decisions with comprehensive price history data.

Privacy-focused: No account required, all data stored locally on your device.

Start saving money today with Price Tracker!
